OOC: To be honest, I'm very touched, I almost cried when I read that, dcobu=
rn. By the way, is there a handle you wish to be called by?...

BIC: The Ch=
osen Ones peer at the Predacon cave. The Predacons may have been healed by =
now, but they still are low on soldiers! This had to be an all out attack, =
otherwise, it would give the Predacons too much time to attack back. They g=
ot ready...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: dcoburn 
  To: nbwrpg@e=
groups.com 
  Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2000 7:15 PM
  Subject: HAPPY BIRT=
HDAY NEO BEAST WARS!!!!



       
       My Groups | nbwrpg Main Page | St=
art a new group!  



  (OOC: I almost forgot!!!  Happy Birthday NBWRPG!!! =
 I have not been here very long, I joined early in August I think.  I haven=
't been around for some of the major changes.  I'm glad to be part of the N=
BW community, and I'm glad to have all you people here to talk to, and RP w=
ith!!!!  I have a couple thank yous to give out:
   
  Yanshosh yanshosh@ao=
l.com -For letting me be on the list, and letting me help out with the char=
 and members page and for being a good owner,moderator, RPmate and a friend=
.
   
  Logomorph logomorph@... -For boosting my spirits, and makin=
g days of my life happier, and being a good RPmate.
   
  Soulstice thecode=
@... -For being a good RPmate.  Even if people don't listen to him!=
!
   
  KSLawdogg KSLawdogg@... -For being a good moderator and a good R=
Pmate.
   
  Inferno Inferno731@... -For being a good moderator.
   
  =
JP JP3884@... -For being a good moderator, RPmate and being a good writ=
er.
   
  Wilddance_Mare wilddance_mare@... -For being a good moder=
ator, and a good RPmate.
   
  Carnage carnage@... -For being a goo=
d, expressive writer.
   
  Everyone -For being part of this RPG, and being=
 good RPers in general.
   
  Neo Beast Wars RPG itself nbwrpg@egroups.com =
-For revealing to me a huge part of myself, and for being there, and for pu=
tting up with all the emails, and members it gets.
   
  eGroups -For being=
 a major part of my life as well, opening up the world of RPing and friends=
.  
   
  Thank you all!!!!!!!!!  Big thanks!!!!!!!!!  
   
   
   
   
   =
